ehi sabhapathi waidya sisira kodagoda mahatha sandahan kale idiri sathi dekaka kalaya thula di eeta adala gasat pathraya da prakashayata pathkirimata piyawara ganna bawayi.

dharmasena pathirajage - paradige - (chandare) dharmasena pathirajage - ahas gawwa - (mahathun) dharmasena pathirajage - eya dan loku lamayek dharmasena pathirajage - bambaaru awith - (bebi mahaththaya) lestar jems pirisge - ahasin polawata lestar jems pirisge - baddegama (babun) sumithra pirisge - ganga addara ( dosthara sarath pathirana) tayitas thotawaththage - maruwa samaga wase wasantha obesekarage - kadapathaka chaya (dhanarathna mudalali) sunil aariyarathnage - podi malli sunil aariyarathnage - anupama sunil aariyarathnage - kristhu charithaya (kristhus wahanse) karumakkarayo saha madhu samaya me chithrapata siyalla atharin samahara eewa athamwita wanija sinamawata nambauru wuth, thawath samahara eewa kalathmaka sinamawata nambauru wuth sinama kruthi wana athara thawath samahara eewa kalathmaka wanija chithrapata wiya.
